rows.label: qst201915_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah yes... We have listened
to the trials and tribulations
of these poor children.

rows.label: qst201915_msg0002
rows.name:
And we intend to help
each and every one.

rows.label: qst201915_msg0003
rows.name: What?! How many are we talking here?

rows.label: qst201915_msg0004
rows.name: Uh, and how many is that gonna be?

rows.label: qst201915_msg0005
rows.name:
Could you be more precise? How
many do you intend to help?

rows.label: qst201915_msg0006
rows.name:
You wanna help all the kids here?!
How many will that be then?

rows.label: qst201915_msg0007
rows.name:
We estimate somewhere
in the region of 10.

rows.label: qst201915_msg0008
rows.name:
But fear not. We shall also be
assisting them personally this time.

rows.label: qst201915_msg0009
rows.name:
No need to be so modest. We
are a team, are we not?

rows.label: qst201915_msg0010
rows.name:
It shall be a give-and-take
relationship. What greater reward
than the bond of friendship?

rows.label: qst201915_msg0011
rows.name:
It is rather a lot, we know, but
there is no need for alarm.

rows.label: qst201915_msg0012
rows.name:
You are our Driver. We expect
you to answer the call of duty!
